game.name: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time" (TRotEotGRPGoAT for short) is the last hour of a lost (nonexistent) JRPG, "remade” with director’s commentary, the digital manual, and archival footage. It's a deduction puzzle game made from a JRPG that holds a dark secret.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time" (TRotEotGRPGoAT for short) is the last hour of a lost (nonexistent) JRPG, "remade” with director’s commentary, the digital manual, and archival footage. It's a deduction puzzle game made from a JRPG that holds a dark secret.
game.developers: Coin Drop Games, Lucas Immanuel, Jacob Dominick, Kyle Chuang
